operation_config_data:
\
[DEFAULT]\
cluster_server = beluga.genome.mcgill.ca\
sequencing_center = McGill Genome Centre\
cluster_submit_cmd_suffix = | grep "[0-9]" | cut -d\  -f4\
cluster_other_arg = --mail-type=FAIL --mail-user=$JOB_MAIL -A $RAP_ID\
cluster_work_dir_arg = -D\
cluster_output_dir_arg = -o\
cluster_job_name_arg = -J\
cluster_cmd_produces_job_id = true\
cluster_dependency_arg = --depend=afterok:\
cluster_dependency_sep = :\
cluster_max_jobs = 3000\
tmp_dir = ${SLURM_TMPDIR}\
portal_output_dir = $PORTAL_OUTPUT_DIR\
cluster_walltime = 24:00:00\
cluster_cpu = 1\
cluster_node = 1\
ALL_CPU = 40\
HALF_CPU = 20\
QUART_CPU = 10\
PINT_CPU = 5\
ALL_MEM = 187G\
HALF_MEM = 90G\
QUART_MEM = 60G\
PINT_MEM = 30G\
cluster_mem = 4700M per cpu\
cluster_queue = \
LARGE_QUEUE = \
module_bvatools = mugqic/bvatools/1.6\
module_bwa = mugqic/bwa/0.7.17\
module_bwakit = mugqic/bwakit/0.7.15\
module_gatk = mugqic/GenomeAnalysisTK/4.1.8.1\
module_sambamba = mugqic/sambamba/0.8.0\
module_igvtools = mugqic/igvtools/2.3.14\
module_java = mugqic/java/openjdk-jdk1.8.0_72\
module_mugqic_R_packages = mugqic/mugqic_R_packages/1.0.4\
module_mugqic_tools = mugqic/mugqic_tools/2.10.5\
module_pandoc = mugqic/pandoc/2.16.1\
module_perl = mugqic/perl/5.34.0\
module_picard = mugqic/picard/2.9.0\
module_python = mugqic/python/3.9.1\
module_R = mugqic/R_Bioconductor/3.5.0_3.7\
module_samtools = mugqic/samtools/1.12\
module_bcftools = mugqic/bcftools/1.15\
module_snpeff = mugqic/snpEff/4.3\
module_trimmomatic = mugqic/trimmomatic/0.35\
module_vcftools = mugqic/vcftools/0.1.14\
module_skewer = mugqic/skewer/0.2.2\
module_qualimap = mugqic/qualimap/2.2.2dev\
module_fastqc = mugqic/fastqc/0.11.5\
module_htslib = mugqic/htslib/1.14\
module_verify_bam_id = mugqic/verifyBamID/1.1.3\
module_vt = mugqic/vt/0.57\
module_gemini = mugqic/gemini/0.20.1\
module_multiqc = mugqic/MultiQC/1.9\
module_checkmate = mugqic/NGSCheckMate/1.0.0_rjme\
module_variantBam = mugqic/variantbam/1.4.3\
module_cnvkit = mugqic/CNVkit/0.9.9\
module_delly = mugqic/Delly/0.8.1\
module_sv_annotations = mugqic/simple_sv_annotation/1.0.0\
module_manta = mugqic/Manta/1.5.0\
module_samblaster = mugqic/samblaster/0.1.24\
module_lumpy = mugqic/LUMPY-SV/0.2.13\
module_wham = mugqic/WHAM/1.8.0\
module_breakseq2 = mugqic/breakseq2/2.2\
module_vcflib = mugqic/vcflib/1.0.0\
module_spades = mugqic/SPAdes/3.10.0\
module_age = mugqic/AGE/master-20181210\
module_bedtools = mugqic/bedtools/2.26.0\
module_vawk = mugqic/vawk/0.0.2\
module_svaba = mugqic/SvABA/1.1.0\
scientific_name = Homo_sapiens\
assembly = GRCh38\
source = Ensembl\
version = 102\
assembly_alias = b37\
dbsnp_version = 142\
assembly_dir = $MUGQIC_INSTALL_HOME/genomes/species/%(scientific_name)s.%(assembly)s\
genome_fasta = %(assembly_dir)s/genome/%(scientific_name)s.%(assembly)s.fa\
genome_dictionary = %(assembly_dir)s/genome/%(scientific_name)s.%(assembly)s.dict\
genome_bwa_index = %(assembly_dir)s/genome/bwa_index/%(scientific_name)s.%(assembly)s.fa\
known_variants = %(assembly_dir)s/annotations/%(scientific_name)s.%(assembly)s.dbSNP%(dbsnp_version)s.vcf.gz\
igv_genome = %(genome_fasta)s.fai\
snpeff_genome = %(assembly)s.%(version)s\
hapmap = %(assembly_dir)s/annotations/%(scientific_name)s.%(assembly)s.hapmap_3.3.vcf.gz\
1000G = %(assembly_dir)s/annotations/%(scientific_name)s.%(assembly)s.1000G_phase1.snps.high_confidence.vcf.gz\
dbsnp = %(known_variants)s\
omni = %(assembly_dir)s/annotations/%(scientific_name)s.%(assembly)s.1000G_omni2.5.vcf.gz\
mills = %(assembly_dir)s/annotations/%(scientific_name)s.%(assembly)s.Mills_and_1000G_gold_standard.indels.vcf.gz\
genome_mappability_bed_indexed = %(assembly_dir)s/annotations/mappabilityGC/GRCh38_100bpPAIREDEND.exclusion.bed\
dbnsfp = %(assembly_dir)s/annotations/dbNSFPv3.5a/dbNSFPv3.5a.txt.gz.txt.gz\
common_snp_positions = %(assembly_dir)s/annotations/%(scientific_name)s.%(assembly)s.1000G_phase1.snps.high_confidence.allpop_q200.tsv\
gnomad_exome = %(assembly_dir)s/annotations/%(scientific_name)s.%(assembly)s.gnomad.exomes.r2.0.2.sites.no-VEP.nohist.tidy.vcf.gz\
af_gnomad = %(assembly_dir)s/annotations/%(scientific_name)s.%(assembly)s.af-only-gnomad.vcf.gz\
vcf_header = %(assembly_dir)s/annotations/%(scientific_name)s.%(assembly)s.vcf_header.tsv\
java_other_options = -XX:+UseParallelGC -XX:ParallelGCThreads=1 -Dsamjdk.buffer_size=4194304\
gatk4_java_options = -XX:+UseParallelGC -XX:ParallelGCThreads=1 -Dsamjdk.buffer_size=4194304 -Dsamjdk.use_async_io_read_samtools=true -Dsamjdk.use_async_io_write_samtools=true -Dsamjdk.use_async_io_write_tribble=false\
experiment_type = wholeGenome\
experiment_type_abrev = wgs\
population_AF = 1000Gp1_EUR_AF\
verifyBamID_variants_file = %(assembly_dir)s/annotations/%(scientific_name)s.%(assembly)s.dbSNP%(dbsnp_version)s_1000Gp1_%(population_AF)s_AF.vcf\
species_vcf_format_descriptor = %(assembly_dir)s/annotations/HumanVCFformatDescriptor.tsv\
excluded_chromosome = chrM,chr1_KI270706v1_random,chr1_KI270707v1_random,chr1_KI270708v1_random,chr1_KI270709v1_random,chr1_KI270710v1_random,chr1_KI270711v1_random,chr1_KI270712v1_random,chr1_KI270713v1_random,chr1_KI270714v1_random,chr2_KI270715v1_random,chr2_KI270716v1_random,chr3_GL000221v1_random,chr4_GL000008v2_random,chr5_GL000208v1_random,chr9_KI270717v1_random,chr9_KI270718v1_random,chr9_KI270719v1_random,chr9_KI270720v1_random,chr11_KI270721v1_random,chr14_GL000009v2_random,chr14_GL000225v1_random,chr14_KI270722v1_random,chr14_GL000194v1_random,chr14_KI270723v1_random,chr14_KI270724v1_random,chr14_KI270725v1_random,chr14_KI270726v1_random,chr15_KI270727v1_random,chr16_KI270728v1_random,chr17_GL000205v2_random,chr17_KI270729v1_random,chr17_KI270730v1_random,chr22_KI270731v1_random,chr22_KI270732v1_random,chr22_KI270733v1_random,chr22_KI270734v1_random,chr22_KI270735v1_random,chr22_KI270736v1_random,chr22_KI270737v1_random,chr22_KI270738v1_random,chr22_KI270739v1_random,chrY_KI270740v1_random,chrUn_KI270302v1,chrUn_KI270304v1,chrUn_KI270303v1,chrUn_KI270305v1,chrUn_KI270322v1,chrUn_KI270320v1,chrUn_KI270310v1,chrUn_KI270316v1,chrUn_KI270315v1,chrUn_KI270312v1,chrUn_KI270311v1,chrUn_KI270317v1,chrUn_KI270412v1,chrUn_KI270411v1,chrUn_KI270414v1,chrUn_KI270419v1,chrUn_KI270418v1,chrUn_KI270420v1,chrUn_KI270424v1,chrUn_KI270417v1,chrUn_KI270422v1,chrUn_KI270423v1,chrUn_KI270425v1,chrUn_KI270429v1,chrUn_KI270442v1,chrUn_KI270466v1,chrUn_KI270465v1,chrUn_KI270467v1,chrUn_KI270435v1,chrUn_KI270438v1,chrUn_KI270468v1,chrUn_KI270510v1,chrUn_KI270509v1,chrUn_KI270518v1,chrUn_KI270508v1,chrUn_KI270516v1,chrUn_KI270512v1,chrUn_KI270519v1,chrUn_KI270522v1,chrUn_KI270511v1,chrUn_KI270515v1,chrUn_KI270507v1,chrUn_KI270517v1,chrUn_KI270529v1,chrUn_KI270528v1,chrUn_KI270530v1,chrUn_KI270539v1,chrUn_KI270538v1,chrUn_KI270544v1,chrUn_KI270548v1,chrUn_KI270583v1,chrUn_KI270587v1,chrUn_KI270580v1,chrUn_KI270581v1,chrUn_KI270579v1,chrUn_KI270589v1,chrUn_KI270590v1,chrUn_KI270584v1,chrUn_KI270582v1,chrUn_KI270588v1,chrUn_KI270593v1,chrUn_KI270591v1,chrUn_KI270330v1,chrUn_KI270329v1,chrUn_KI270334v1,chrUn_KI270333v1,chrUn_KI270335v1,chrUn_KI270338v1,chrUn_KI270340v1,chrUn_KI270336v1,chrUn_KI270337v1,chrUn_KI270363v1,chrUn_KI270364v1,chrUn_KI270362v1,chrUn_KI270366v1,chrUn_KI270378v1,chrUn_KI270379v1,chrUn_KI270389v1,chrUn_KI270390v1,chrUn_KI270387v1,chrUn_KI270395v1,chrUn_KI270396v1,chrUn_KI270388v1,chrUn_KI270394v1,chrUn_KI270386v1,chrUn_KI270391v1,chrUn_KI270383v1,chrUn_KI270393v1,chrUn_KI270384v1,chrUn_KI270392v1,chrUn_KI270381v1,chrUn_KI270385v1,chrUn_KI270382v1,chrUn_KI270376v1,chrUn_KI270374v1,chrUn_KI270372v1,chrUn_KI270373v1,chrUn_KI270375v1,chrUn_KI270371v1,chrUn_KI270448v1,chrUn_KI270521v1,chrUn_GL000195v1,chrUn_GL000219v1,chrUn_GL000220v1,chrUn_GL000224v1,chrUn_KI270741v1,chrUn_GL000226v1,chrUn_GL000213v1,chrUn_KI270743v1,chrUn_KI270744v1,chrUn_KI270745v1,chrUn_KI270746v1,chrUn_KI270747v1,chrUn_KI270748v1,chrUn_KI270749v1,chrUn_KI270750v1,chrUn_KI270751v1,chrUn_KI270752v1,chrUn_KI270753v1,chrUn_KI270754v1,chrUn_KI270755v1,chrUn_KI270756v1,chrUn_KI270757v1,chrUn_GL000214v1,chrUn_KI270742v1,chrUn_GL000216v2,chrUn_GL000218v1,chrEBV\
ALL_MEM_EPS = 180G\
GPU_QUEUE = \
module_vardict_java = mugqic/VarDictJava/1.4.8\
module_strelka2 = mugqic/Strelka2/2.9.10\
module_bcbio_variation_recall = mugqic/bcbio.variation.recall/0.2.6\
module_varscan = mugqic/VarScan/2.4.3\
module_conpair = mugqic/Conpair/0.2\
module_scones = mugqic/SCoNEs/2.1.2\
module_sequenza_utils = mugqic/Sequenza-utils/3.0.0\
module_gcc = mugqic/gcc/4.9.3\
module_amber = mugqic/amber/3.5\
module_cobalt = mugqic/cobalt/1.11\
module_purple = mugqic/purple/2.53\
module_circos = mugqic/circos/0.69-6\
module_cpsr = mugqic/cpsr/0.6.2\
module_pcgr = mugqic/pcgr/0.9.2\
strelka2_bed_file = %(assembly_dir)s/annotations/%(scientific_name)s.%(assembly)s.strelka2.bed.gz\
common_name = Human\
assembly_synonyms = hg38\
CTAT_bundle_version = GRCh38_gencode_v32_CTAT_lib_Dec062019\
\
[picard_sam_to_fastq]\
cluster_cpu = -c 12 -N 1\
cluster_mem = --mem=32G\
ram = 18G\
cluster_walltime = --time=72:00:00\
other_options = --MAX_RECORDS_IN_RAM=5000000\
\
[samtools_cram_output]\
options = -h -T %(genome_fasta)s -C\
variantBam_options = --cram -strip-tags BI,OQ\
cluster_cpu = %(PINT_CPU)s\
cluster_walltime = 48:00:0\
\
[sym_link_fastq]\
cluster_walltime = 3:00:00\
\
[sym_link_bam]\
cluster_walltime = 3:00:00\
\
[trimmomatic]\
cluster_mem = 20G\
ram = 19G\
cluster_cpu = 5\
threads = %(cluster_cpu)s\
trailing_min_quality = 30\
min_length = 50\
illumina_clip_settings = :2:30:15\
java_other_options = -XX:ParallelGCThreads=5 -Dsamjdk.buffer_size=1048576\
\
[skewer_trimming]\
cluster_cpu = %(QUART_CPU)s\
threads = %(cluster_cpu)s\
options = --min 25 -q 25 --compress -f sanger\
adapter_fasta = \
cluster_walltime = 48:00:00\
\
[bwa_mem]\
cluster_cpu = %(HALF_CPU)s\
bwa_other_options = -t %(cluster_cpu)s -K 100000000 -Y\
sequencing_center = McGill University and Genome Quebec Innovation Centre\
sequencing_technology = Illumina\
\
[picard_sort_sam]\
ram = 16G\
max_records_in_ram = 3750000\
\
[sambamba_sort_sam]\
options = -m 10G\
\
[bwa_mem_sambamba_sort_sam]\
cluster_cpu = %(HALF_CPU)s\
cluster_walltime = 48:00:00\
cluster_mem = 60G\
\
[bwakit_picard_sort_sam]\
cluster_cpu = 4\
cluster_walltime = 48:00:00\
cluster_mem = 60G\
\
[sambamba_merge_sam_extract_unmapped]\
cluster_cpu = 8\
options = -t %(cluster_cpu)s\
cluster_walltime = 35:00:00\
cluster_mem = 32G\
\
[sambamba_extract_unmapped]\
cluster_cpu = %(PINT_CPU)s\
options = -t %(PINT_CPU)s -f bam -F "unmapped"\
cluster_walltime = 3:00:00\
\
[gatk_indel_realigner]\
java_other_options = -XX:+UseParallelGC -XX:ParallelGCThreads=1 -Dsamjdk.buffer_size=4194304\
nb_jobs = 23\
ram = 12G\
max_reads_in_memory = 500000\
cluster_cpu = 1\
other_options = \
cluster_walltime = 35:00:0\
cluster_mem = 12G\
module_gatk = mugqic/GenomeAnalysisTK/3.8\
\
[gatk_realigner_target_creator]\
java_other_options = -XX:+UseParallelGC -XX:ParallelGCThreads=1 -Dsamjdk.buffer_size=4194304\
ram = 12G\
known_mills = %(mills)s\
cluster_cpu = 1\
other_options = -nt 1\
module_gatk = mugqic/GenomeAnalysisTK/3.8\
known_indel_sites = %(mills)s\
\
[sambamba_merge_realigned]\
cluster_cpu = %(QUART_CPU)s\
options = -t %(cluster_cpu)s\
cluster_walltime = 35:00:00\
cluster_mem = 48G\
\
[sambamba_merge_unmapped]\
cluster_cpu = %(QUART_CPU)s\
options = -t %(cluster_cpu)s\
cluster_walltime = 12:00:00\
\
[merge_realigned]\
cluster_walltime = 35:00:00\
cluster_cpu = 3\
cluster_mem = --mem=32G\
\
[bvatools_groupfixmate]\
java_other_options = -XX:+UseParallelGC -XX:ParallelGCThreads=1 -Dsamjdk.buffer_size=4194304\
ram = 16G\
\
[samtools_sort]\
cluster_cpu = 5\
other_options = -@ %(cluster_cpu)s -m 20000M\
cluster_walltime = 71:00:00\
\
[fix_mate_by_coordinate]\
cluster_cpu = 4\
cluster_walltime = 71:00:00\
cluster_mem = 52G\
\
[samtools_fixmate]\
module_samtools = mugqic/samtools/1.9\
\
[fix_mate_by_coordinate_samtools]\
cluster_cpu = %(QUART_CPU)s\
options = -m -O bam -@ %(cluster_cpu)s\
cluster_walltime = 35:00:00\
cluster_mem = 48G\
\
[picard_mark_duplicates]\
cluster_cpu = %(PINT_CPU)s\
java_other_options = -XX:+UseParallelGC -XX:ParallelGCThreads=2 -Dsamjdk.buffer_size=4194304\
ram = 14G\
max_records_in_ram = 1000000\
cluster_walltime = 71:00:00\
cluster_mem = 15G\
\
[gatk_base_recalibrator]\
cluster_cpu = %(HALF_CPU)s\
threads = %(cluster_cpu)s\
cluster_mem = 55G\
ram = %(cluster_mem)s\
options = --bqsr-baq-gap-open-penalty 30\
known_dbsnp = %(dbsnp)s\
known_gnomad = %(gnomad_exome)s\
known_mills = %(mills)s\
cluster_walltime = 35:00:0\
\
[gatk_print_reads]\
java_other_options = -XX:+UseParallelGC -XX:ParallelGCThreads=4 -Dsamjdk.buffer_size=4194304\
cluster_cpu = -l nodes=1:ppn=40\
threads = %(cluster_cpu)s\
cluster_mem = 187G\
ram = 180G\
cluster_walltime = 96:00:0\
\
[gatk_apply_bqsr]\
java_other_options = -XX:+UseParallelGC -XX:ParallelGCThreads=2 -Dsamjdk.buffer_size=4194304 -Dsamjdk.use_async_io_read_samtools=true -Dsamjdk.use_async_io_write_samtools=true -Dsamjdk.use_async_io_write_tribble=false\
cluster_cpu = 40\
threads = %(cluster_cpu)s\
options = \
cluster_mem = 186G\
ram = 180G\
cluster_walltime = 96:00:0\
\
[recalibration]\
cluster_walltime = 96:00:0\
cluster_mem = 51G\
ram = 50G\
\
[sambamba_index]\
cluster_cpu = %(QUART_CPU)s\
options = -t %(cluster_cpu)s\
\
[picard_collect_multiple_metrics]\
module_gatk = mugqic/GenomeAnalysisTK/4.2.2.0\
cluster_cpu = 1\
cluster_mem = 12G\
ram = 11G\
max_records_in_ram = 1000000\
options = --FILE_EXTENSION ".txt"\
cluster_walltime = 48:00:00\
\
[picard_calculate_hs_metrics]\
module_gatk = mugqic/GenomeAnalysisTK/4.2.2.0\
cluster_mem = 9G\
ram = 8G\
cluster_walltime = 48:00:00\
\
[metrics]\
module_gatk = mugqic/GenomeAnalysisTK/4.2.2.0\
cluster_walltime = walltime=24:00:0\
cluster_mem = 12G\
\
[picard_collect_oxog_metrics]\
module_gatk = mugqic/GenomeAnalysisTK/4.2.2.0\
cluster_mem = 13G\
ram = 12G\
max_records_in_ram = 4000000\
cluster_walltime = 35:00:0\
\
[picard_collect_gcbias_metrics]\
module_gatk = mugqic/GenomeAnalysisTK/4.2.2.0\
cluster_mem = 13G\
ram = 12G\
max_records_in_ram = 4000000\
cluster_walltime = 35:00:0\
\
[dna_sample_qualimap]\
cluster_mem = 120G\
ram = 120G\
use_bed = false\
cluster_cpu = -l nodes=1:ppn=24\
qualimap_options = --skip-duplicated -nt 1 -gd HUMAN\
cluster_walltime = 35:00:0\
\
[dna_sambamba_flagstat]\
cluster_cpu = 6\
flagstat_options = -t %(cluster_cpu)s\
cluster_walltime = -l walltime=12:00:0\
\
[fastqc]\
cluster_cpu = 4\
threads = %(cluster_cpu)s\
cluster_walltime = -l walltime=35:00:0\
\
[multiqc]\
module_python = mugqic/python/3.7.3\
cluster_walltime = -l walltime=2:00:0\
options = \
\
[gatk_depth_of_coverage]\
module_gatk = mugqic/GenomeAnalysisTK/3.8\
java_other_options = -XX:ParallelGCThreads=2\
ram = 8000M\
cluster_mem = 8G\
summary_coverage_thresholds = 10,25,50,75,100,500\
cluster_cpu = 1\
cluster_walltime = 48:00:00\
\
[bvatools_depth_of_coverage]\
coverage_targets = auto\
other_options = --gc --maxDepth 1001 --summaryCoverageThresholds 1,5,10,25,50,75,100,500,1000 --minMappingQuality 15 --minBaseQuality 15 --ommitN\
cluster_mem = 35G\
ram = 35G\
cluster_cpu = %(QUART_CPU)s\
threads = %(cluster_cpu)s\
cluster_walltime = 96:00:00\
\
[igvtools_compute_tdf]\
ram = 6G\
cluster_walltime = 96:00:00\
cluster_cpu = 1\
option = -f min,max,mean -w 25\
cluster_mem = 7G\
\
[gatk_callable_loci]\
module_gatk = mugqic/GenomeAnalysisTK/3.8\
java_other_options = -XX:ParallelGCThreads=2\
cluster_mem = 11G\
ram = 10G\
other_options = -dt none --minDepth 10 --maxDepth 500 --minDepthForLowMAPQ 10 --minMappingQuality 10 --minBaseQuality 15\
cluster_walltime = 35:00:00\
\
[bvatools_basefreq]\
cluster_mem = 8G\
threads = 1\
ram = 8G\
\
[extract_common_snp_freq]\
cluster_cpu = 2\
cluster_walltime = 35:00:00\
cluster_mem = 20G\
\
[bvatools_ratiobaf]\
cluster_cpu = 5\
cluster_mem = 71G\
ram = 70G\
other_options = --plot --maxDepth 1000  --exclude %(excluded_chromosome)s\
\
[baf_plot]\
cluster_cpu = %(QUART_CPU)s\
cluster_walltime = 24:00:00\
cluster_mem = 48G\
\
[vcftools_missing_indv]\
options = \
cluster_walltime = 24:00:00\
\
[vcftools_depth]\
options = \
cluster_walltime = 24:00:00\
\
[gatk_crosscheck_fingerprint]\
module_gatk = mugqic/GenomeAnalysisTK/4.2.2.0\
java_other_options = -XX:+UseParallelGC -XX:ParallelGCThreads=1 -Dsamjdk.buffer_size=4194304 -Dsamjdk.use_async_io_read_samtools=true -Dsamjdk.use_async_io_write_samtools=true -Dsamjdk.use_async_io_write_tribble=false\
cluster_cpu = 4\
options = --NUM_THREADS %(cluster_cpu)s --EXIT_CODE_WHEN_MISMATCH 0\
cluster_mem = 16G\
ram = 15G\
haplotype_database = %(assembly_dir)s/annotations/%(scientific_name)s.%(assembly)s.fingerprint.map\
lod_threshold = 3.0\
cluster_walltime = 24:00:00\
\
[gatk_cluster_crosscheck_metrics]\
module_gatk = mugqic/GenomeAnalysisTK/4.2.2.0\

\
[vardict_paired]\
module_python = mugqic/python/2.7.18\
cluster_cpu = 4\
java_other_options = -XX:+UseParallelGC -XX:ParallelGCThreads=1 -Dsamjdk.buffer_size=4194304\
use_bed = false\
dict2bed_options = -c 5000 -o 250\
nb_jobs = 22\
vardict_options = -f 0.03 -Q 11 -c 1 -S 2 -E 3 -g 4 -th %(cluster_cpu)s\
var2vcf_options = -f 0.03 -P 0.9 -m 4.25 -M\
java_options = -Xms768m\
cluster_mem = 16G\
ram = 16000M\
classpath = $VARDICT_HOME/lib/VarDict-1.4.8.jar:$VARDICT_HOME/lib/commons-cli-1.2.jar:$VARDICT_HOME/lib/jregex-1.2_01.jar:$VARDICT_HOME/lib/htsjdk-2.8.0.jar com.astrazeneca.vardict.Main\
cluster_walltime = -l walltime=72:00:0\
\
[merge_filter_paired_vardict]\
somatic_filter_options = -f PASS -i 'INFO/STATUS~".*Somatic"'\
germline_filter_options = -f PASS -i 'INFO/STATUS~"Germline"|INFO/STATUS~".*LOH"'\
genotype_filter_options = -e 'GT[*]="RR"'\
cluster_mem = 12G\
cluster_walltime = -l walltime=3:00:0\
\
[strelka2_paired_somatic]\
module_python = mugqic/python/2.7.18\
option_mode = local\
cluster_cpu = %(HALF_CPU)s\
option_nodes = %(cluster_cpu)s\
cluster_mem = 55G\
ram = 55G\
bed_file = %(strelka2_bed_file)s\
experiment_type_option = \
filter_options = -f PASS -Oz\
cluster_walltime = -l walltime=24:00:0\
\
[strelka2_paired_germline]\
module_python = mugqic/python/2.7.18\
option_mode = local\
cluster_cpu = %(HALF_CPU)s\
option_nodes = %(cluster_cpu)s\
cluster_mem = 55G\
ram = 55G\
bed_file = %(strelka2_bed_file)s\
experiment_type_option = \
filter_options = -f PASS -Oz -e 'GT[*]="RR"'\
cluster_walltime = -l walltime=48:00:0\
\
[strelka2_paired_germline_snpeff]\
split_options = -Oz -i'GT="alt"'\
options = \
cluster_mem = 12G\
ram = 12000M\
cluster_walltime = -l walltime=24:00:0\
\
[bcbio_ensemble]\
cluster_cpu = 2\
cluster_mem = 24G\
ram = 24G\
\
[bcbio_ensemble_somatic]\
cluster_cpu = 6\
options = --cores %(cluster_cpu)s --numpass 1 --names mutect2,strelka2,vardict,varscan2\
cluster_mem = 24G\
ram = 24G\
cluster_walltime = -l walltime=3:00:0\
\
[bcbio_ensemble_germline]\
cluster_cpu = 6\
options = --cores %(cluster_cpu)s --numpass 1 --names strelka2,vardict,varscan2\
cluster_mem = 24G\
ram = 24G\
cluster_walltime = -l walltime=3:00:0\
\
[gatk_variant_annotator]\
java_other_options = -XX:+UseParallelGC -XX:ParallelGCThreads=1 -Dsamjdk.buffer_size=4194304\
module_gatk = mugqic/GenomeAnalysisTK/3.7\
cluster_mem = 12G\
ram = 12000M\
nb_jobs = 20\
cluster_walltime = -l walltime=12:00:0\
\
[gatk_variant_annotator_somatic]\
cluster_cpu = 2\
other_options = -nt 2 --dbsnp %(known_variants)s -G StandardAnnotation -G StandardSomaticAnnotation -A HomopolymerRun -A Coverage -A DepthPerAlleleBySample -A ClippingRankSumTest -A BaseQualityRankSumTest -A MappingQualityRankSumTest -A MappingQualityZeroBySample -A LowMQ -A ReadPosRankSumTest -A GCContent\
\
[gatk_variant_annotator_germline]\
cluster_cpu = 2\
other_options = -nt 2 --dbsnp %(known_variants)s -A HomopolymerRun -A Coverage -A DepthPerAlleleBySample -A ClippingRankSumTest -A BaseQualityRankSumTest -A MappingQualityRankSumTest -A MappingQualityZeroBySample -A LowMQ -A ReadPosRankSumTest -A GCContent\
\
[merge_gatk_variant_annotator]\
cluster_cpu = 2\
cluster_walltime = -l walltime=3:00:0\
\
[filter_ensemble]\
module_python = mugqic/python/3.10.4\
call_filter = 2\
somatic_filter_options = -Oz -i'TDP>=10 && TVAF>=0.05 && NDP>=10 && NVAF<=0.05'\
germline_filter_options = -Oz -i'TDP>=10 && TVAF>=0.05 && NDP>=10 && NVAF>=0.05'\
cluster_mem = 12G\
cluster_walltime = -l walltime=3:00:0\
\
[report_cpsr]\
options = --no_vcf_validate --force_overwrite --no_docker --secondary_findings --gwas_findings --panel_id 0\
assembly = grch38\
cluster_cpu = %(PINT_CPU)s\
cluster_mem = 36G\
cluster_walltime = -l walltime=3:00:0\
\
[report_pcgr]\
options = --no_vcf_validate --force_overwrite --no_docker --vep_buffer_size 500 --vep_regulatory --show_noncoding --vcf2maf\
tumor_type = --tumor_site 0\
tumor_options = --call_conf_tag TAL --tumor_dp_tag TDP --tumor_af_tag TVAF --tumor_dp_min 10 --tumor_af_min 0.05\
normal_options = --control_dp_tag NDP --control_af_tag NVAF --control_dp_min 10 --control_af_max 0.05\
mutsig_options = --estimate_signatures\
tmb_options = --estimate_tmb --tmb_algorithm nonsyn\
msi_options = --estimate_msi_status\
assembly = grch38\
assay = --assay WGS\
cluster_cpu = %(HALF_CPU)s\
cluster_mem = 36G\
cluster_walltime = -l walltime=3:00:0\
\
[compute_cancer_effects_somatic]\
java_other_options = -XX:ParallelGCThreads=1\
options = -cancer -lof\
snpeff_genome = hg19\
cluster_walltime = 12:00:0\
cluster_mem = 12G\
ram = 12000M\
\
[compute_cancer_effects_germline]\
java_other_options = -XX:ParallelGCThreads=1\
options = -lof\
snpeff_genome = hg19\
cluster_walltime = -l walltime=12:00:0\
ram = 12000M\
cluster_mem = 12G\
\
[gatk_combine_variants]\
\
[decompose_and_normalize_mnps]\
cluster_walltime = 12:00:0\
\
[set_somatic_and_actionable_mutations]\
set_somatic = --min-depth 30 --min-tumor-depth 10 --min-norm-depth 10\
cluster_walltime = -l walltime=24:00:0\
\
[mpileup_sequenza]\
cluster_walltime = -l walltime=12:00:0\
\
[sequenza]\
nb_jobs = 23\
gc_file = %(assembly_dir)s/annotations/%(scientific_name)s.%(assembly)s.gc50Base.txt\
bin_window_size = 50\
mpileup_options = -d 1000 -L 1000 -B -Q 25 -q 15\
pileup_options = -q 20 -N 30\
cluster_walltime = -l walltime=24:00:0\
cluster_mem = 12G\
\
[amber]\
java_other_options = -XX:+UseParallelGC -XX:ParallelGCThreads=1 -Dsamjdk.buffer_size=4194304\
cluster_mem = 16G\
ram = 16000M\
cluster_cpu = %(PINT_CPU)s\
threads = %(cluster_cpu)s\
loci = %(assembly_dir)s/annotations/%(scientific_name)s.%(assembly)s.GermlineHetPon.vcf.gz\
cluster_walltime = -l walltime=12:00:0\
\
[cobalt]\
java_other_options = -XX:+UseParallelGC -XX:ParallelGCThreads=1 -Dsamjdk.buffer_size=4194304\
cluster_mem = 16G\
ram = 16000M\
cluster_cpu = %(PINT_CPU)s\
threads = %(cluster_cpu)s\
gc_profile = %(assembly_dir)s/annotations/%(scientific_name)s.%(assembly)s.GC_profile.1000bp.cnp\
cluster_walltime = -l walltime=12:00:0\
\
[purple]\
java_other_options = -XX:+UseParallelGC -XX:ParallelGCThreads=1 -Dsamjdk.buffer_size=4194304\
module_perl = mugqic/perl/5.34.0\
cluster_mem = 17G\
ram = 16G\
cluster_cpu = %(PINT_CPU)s\
threads = %(cluster_cpu)s\
gc_profile = %(assembly_dir)s/annotations/%(scientific_name)s.%(assembly)s.GC_profile.1000bp.cnp\
cluster_walltime = -l walltime=12:00:0\
\
[samtools_single]\
nb_jobs = 25\
module_samtools = mugqic/samtools/0.1.19\
mpileup_other_options = -B -q 15 -Q 25 -D -S -g\
bcftools_view_options = -bvcg\
cluster_walltime = -l walltime=12:00:0\
\
[merge_samtools_single]\
cluster_walltime = -l walltime=12:00:0\
\
[tabix_split]\
cluster_walltime = -l walltime=12:00:0\
\
[shapeit]\
cluster_cpu = %(PINT_CPU)s\
check_options = \
check_threads = %(cluster_cpu)s\
phase_options = \
phase_threads = %(cluster_cpu)s\
cluster_walltime = -l walltime=12:00:0\
\
[scnaphase]\
cluster_walltime = 12:00:0\
cluster_mem = 16G\
\
[delly_call_filter_somatic]\
type_options = somatic\
DUP_options = -m 300 -a 0.1 -r 0.75\
DEL_options = -m 300 -a 0.1 -r 0.75\
INV_options = -m 300 -a 0.1 -r 0.75\
BND_options = -m 0 -a 0.1 -r 0.75\
INS_options = \
bcftools_options = -i 'FORMAT/DV[0]>4|(INFO/SR>1&INFO/PE>5)|(INFO/SR>5&INFO/PE>1)'\
\
[scones]\
window = 10000\
best_model = 0\
\
[bvatools_bincounter]\
other_options = --minMapQ 15\
cluster_cpu = 2\
java_other_options = -XX:ParallelGCThreads=1\
cluster_mem = 31G\
ram = 30G\
cluster_walltime = -l walltime=24:00:0\
\
[scones_pair]\
cluster_cpu = %(HALF_CPU)s\
other_options = -t %(cluster_cpu)s\
gc_map_bedfile = %(assembly_dir)s/annotations/mappabilityGC/hg1k_v37_bin10kb_GCMAP.bed\
cluster_walltime = -l walltime=24:00:0\
\
[scones_filter]\
best_model = 3\
cluster_walltime = 3:00:0\
cluster_mem = 8G\
\
[scones_annotate]\
excluded_regions_bed = %(assembly_dir)s/annotations/bed/%(scientific_name)s.%(assembly)s.TeloCentro_1Mb.bed\
genes_bed = %(assembly_dir)s/annotations/bed/%(scientific_name)s.%(assembly)s.gene.bed\
dgv_bed = %(assembly_dir)s/annotations/bed/%(scientific_name)s.%(assembly)s.DGV.bed\
microsat_bed = %(assembly_dir)s/annotations/bed/%(scientific_name)s.%(assembly)s.microsat.bed\
repeat_masker_bed = %(assembly_dir)s/annotations/bed/%(scientific_name)s.%(assembly)s.repeatMasker.bed\
autosome_size_file = %(assembly_dir)s/%(scientific_name)s.%(assembly)s.AutosomeSize.txt\
cluster_walltime = -l walltime=3:00:0\
cluster_mem = 8G\
\
[run_arriba]\
blacklist = $ARRIBA_HOME/database/blacklist_hg38_GRCh38_2018-01-13.tsv\
\
operation_cmd_line:
module purge
module load python/3.10.2 mugqic/genpipes/4.2.0
tumor_pair.py \
    -j slurm \
    -t ensemble \
    -r readset.txt \
    -p pair.txt \
    -s 1-40 \
    -c $MUGQIC_PIPELINES_HOME/pipelines/tumor_pair/tumor_pair.base.ini \
        $MUGQIC_PIPELINES_HOME/pipelines/common_ini/beluga.ini \
        $MUGQIC_PIPELINES_HOME/pipelines/tumor_pair/tumor_pair.extras.ini \
        $MUGQIC_PIPELINES_HOME/resources/genomes/config/Homo_sapiens.GRCh38.ini \
  > Tumour_Pair_run.sh
rm -r Tumour_Pair_CHUNKS;
mkdir Tumour_Pair_CHUNKS;
$MUGQIC_PIPELINES_HOME/utils/chunk_genpipes.sh -n 100 Tumour_Pair_run.sh Tumour_Pair_CHUNKS
